name: World Factbook & Statistics 2020 FREE
description: *** World Facts Featured on Google Play! ***  Get to know more about the World with World Facts.  World Factbook 2019 FREE provides valuable up-to-date Facts & Maps on over 250 World Countries.  FEATURES ----------------------------- - Over 170+ data points on 250+ world countries: - Area - Geographic coordinates - Languages  - Government - Capital - Gross domestic product - Background - And much more! - Country flags - Simple easy to use interface. - Large easy to read text. - Great for school, college, university, work and personal use - NO internet connection required. Data is stored within the app.  Be more Informed about the World with Up-To-Date Facts on 250+ Countries.  Data is from the CIA World Factbook. The data is free to use and is in the public domain.  Check out World Fact book 2020 FREE Today.
